name: Ultimate Car Driving Simulator (itch)
description:
[ALPHA]

Ultimate Car Driving Simulator is a driving simulator where you can drive on an infinite randomly generated map and don't think about anything.

Made it originally for a friend but why not share it to other people aswell ?

Controls: ZQSD/WASD to move (depending on your keyboard) and V to change camera view.

Made on Godot 4 Beta 10. Expect bugs.
